name: ChaosMachine
description:
A dark arcade bullet hell game. You play as a white orb, who's trying to fix everything, after the chaos machine broke. Get the highest score possible and then... idk... brag about it.

I made the annoying song that plays in the background

[Freesound.org]

I'd recommend playing it on windows
